thread.title: AR Rahman 'excited' to meet Pele in Kolkata
thread.title_full: AR Rahman 'excited' to meet Pele in Kolkata - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: AR Rahman 'excited' to meet Pele in Kolkata
text:
Academy Award winning music composer AR Rahman is "excited" ahead of his meeting with football legend Pele here on Monday evening.
READ: AR Rahman named Cultural Ambassador for Seychelles
"Excited to meet Pele this evening in Kolkata!" the 'Jai ho' artist posted on his Twitter page.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
Rahman, who is creating music for Pele's biopic Pele: Birth of a Legend , will meet the 74-year-old and be a part of the Legends Night at the Netaji Indoor Stadium on Monday, where former India skipper Sourav Ganguly and West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee will also be present.
For latest Music updates follow us on G+ >>> The Times of India Entertainment
Listen to songs of AR Rahman on Gaana.com
Click here for more Bollywood videos
Pele, three-time FIFA World Cup winner, arrived in the city on Sunday, and will attend Indian Super League (ISL) defending champions Atletico de Kolkata's home game against the Kerala Blasters, where he will be the guest of honour.
WATCH: ISL Opening Ceremony | Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, A R Rahman's Performance
